Detailed Description

template<class T>
class MessageFilterBase< T >

Base class for topic filters (convulutional filters)

Subscribed TopicDescription
inputThe topic the value to be filtered is published at
outputThe topic the filtered value is published at
Template Parameters
TTpye of the Message to be filtered. Operators for the derived filteres must be implemented.
